basic.title: Zombie Attack Survival
basic.description: A 3D zombie survival game Using python and open gl. Players navigate procedurally generated environments, battle waves of zombies with dynamic weapon mechanics.
key_achievements: Developed a dynamic 3D environment with procedural terrain & Implemented multiple camera modes (third-person and Free-fly)
Cannon with limited ammo & Bullet physics with boundary checks

dl_ml_research.title: Multi-Omics Sarcoma Subtype Classification
dl_ml_research.description: Designed and implemented a deep learning architecture for sarcoma subtype classification using multi-omics data.
key_achievements: Resolved critical issues in TCGA sarcoma datasets regarding severe class imbalance.
Optimized model for low sample sizes to achieve high f1-macro scores.

dl_ml_research.title: Music Data Clustering and Feature Extraction
dl_ml_research.description: Extracted audio features and applied unsupervised learning techniques to cluster music data.
key_achievements: Applied VAE (Variational Autoencoders) for hybrid language-music clustering.
Explored data-driven pattern discovery for music-related analysis tasks.
